As of Project 9 your XML facilities must deal with two common elements:
COMMENTS. The test cases from Projects 6 and 7 have shown that people need comments in their test cases so that they can create a pattern with comments and fill in the gaps for the specific cases.
ABBREVIATIONS. Your XML readers and parsers must tolerate both forms of elements without sub-elements, i.e., both <LIST> </LIST> as well as <LIST /> must work for the XML representation of the empty list.
